gpt_comment: [PARTIAL] Alignment. Meteoblue shows a slightly lower temperature range (15.6 - 21.1°C) compared to the baseline (14 - 19°C). Rain and other data not stated. Weather variances aside, it's a decent day to visit the Eiffel Tower, unless you're a monkey who prefers tropical climates.
